column26:
>Elcometer 1020 is a 20 litre (0.70cu ft)10"" Portable Abrasive Blast Machine ideal for small blasting applications and touch up work.
  • Ideal for touch-up applications and spot blasting
  • Compact, low profile size is easy to fill with abrasive
  • Heavy duty wheels are ideal for manoeuvring in small spaces
  • Available with a range of media valves to suit your application
  • Tough 6mm (\xc2\xbc\xe2\x80\x9d) construction ensures long life span
  • Easy and quick to service
